name: Insurance Billed Report
query:
SELECT 
    je.name AS journal_entry,
    je.posting_date AS entry_date,
    je.patient AS patient,
    je.patient_name AS patient_name,
    je.insurance_company,
    -- Sum only the debit and credit for the "1320 - Insurance Receivable - HH" account
    SUM(CASE WHEN jea.account = '1320 - Insurance Receivable - HH' THEN jea.debit ELSE 0 END) AS `Total Debit`,
    SUM(CASE WHEN jea.account = '1320 - Insurance Receivable - HH' THEN jea.credit ELSE 0 END) AS `Total Credit`
FROM 
    `tabJournal Entry` je
JOIN 
    `tabJournal Entry Account` jea ON je.name = jea.parent
WHERE 
    je.insurance_company IS NOT NULL 
    AND je.insurance_company != ''  -- Ensure insurance company is present
    AND je.docstatus = 1  -- Only include submitted journals
    AND je.posting_date BETWEEN %(Start_date)s AND %(End_date)s  -- Parameterized date filter
    -- Ensure the account is "1320 - Insurance Receivable - HH"
    AND jea.account = '1320 - Insurance Receivable - HH'
    -- Optionally, if you want the first entry in the child table, you might need to adjust this
    -- depending on how the "first entry" is defined. This could be based on sequence, date, etc.
GROUP BY 
    je.name, je.posting_date, je.patient, je.patient_name, je.insurance_company
ORDER BY 
    je.posting_date DESC, je.name ASC;
